0.user_question: Mary is baking a cake. The recipe calls for 5 cups of flour and 14 cups of sugar. She already put in 10 cups of flour and 2 cups of sugar. How many more cups of sugar does she need to add?

ost_step.1: The recipe calls for 14 cups of sugar.
ost_step.2: Mary has already added 2 cups of sugar.
ost_step.3: So, Mary needs to add 14 - 2 = 12 cups of sugar.

direct_answer.text: Mary needs to add 12 more cups of sugar. The answer is: 12.
